title: What Happens When You Play This Cop Sim Like It's GTA?
description: The Precinct is an open world cop simulator that gives the player GTA level of freedom. So what happens when you try to play it like it's Grand Theft Auto?
excerpt: The Precinct is an open world cop simulator that gives the player GTA level of freedom. So what happens when you try to play it like it's Grand Theft Auto?
